EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Follow up from MBO Partners (1316802743.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Jon,
Thank you for your response! Enjoy your time off and if you decide to return to freelancing and have any questions please do not hesitate to reach out to me. I hope you have a great weekend as well!
Thank you, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Jon Spurny [mailto:jonspurny@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, September 23, 2011 12:32 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: Follow up from MBO Partners
Hi Ms. Taylor,
Thank you for this email. I am currently taking some time off but will definitely keep MBO in mind if/when I returning to freelancing. I hope you have a great weekend!
Thank you,
Jon
Sent from my iPhone
On Sep 22, 2011, at 3:16 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote: Hi Jon,
I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding the services provided by MBO Partners that might help you when you start your next consulting contract. How are things going? I hope you have found and are working on a project, and wanted to remind you that we may be a great resource to help maximize your income stream and reduce your stresses of operating a consulting practice.
Here are a few tools that summarize our conversation from before:
There are some webinars and videos we have created that might assist you in finding your next contract:http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index
· MBO Partners continues to invest in being a leader for independent consultants across the country. I also wanted to share the news that we released a study you may be interested in. For the first time, theres real hard facts about The State of Independence in America that will reveal not just how many millions of independent professionals there are in the country, but also the unique things that motivate them and help them stay happily independent. If you have any questions for me, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK.
Have a great afternoon,
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
